container.text: *Disclaimer: sería bueno que verifiques cómo funcionan los comandos antes de ejecutarlos, chatgpt es una buena opción btw.*

# Add changes
```sh
git add *
git commit -m "description"
git push
```

# Undo last commit keeping changes
```sh
git reset --soft HEAD~1
```

# Undo last commit without keeping changes
```sh
git reset --hard HEAD~1
```

# Clone remote branch
```sh
git checkout --track origin/some_branch
```

# Get last version of master
```sh
git pull origin master
```

# Force delete local branch
```sh
git branch -D "some_branch"
```

# Delete remote branch
```sh
git push origin --delete "branch"
```

# Move to master
```sh
git checkout master
git pull
```

# Push to master branch in an existing repository
```sh
git remote add origin https://url.git
git push -u origin master
```

# Pull from another branch
```sh
git pull origin "some-branch"
```

# Merge with another branch
```sh
git merge "some-branch"
```
